text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: Version 62.7. I updated this add-on for compatibility with my new other add-on, FindTasksButton. In case that FindTasksButton hide task addition box, TaskviewLayout show task addition box.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: Version 62.6. 1) At disabled/removed from Add-ons Manager, most of defaults are restored, except resizer. 2) I fixed the problem that when resizing task view down, status bar moves down with task view. 3) If not seeing status bar, adjust height with resizer at least level, So, now on, you can see status bar at the level. 4) If adjusting each layout size, each layout size is restored. November 26 2020. From Sungho Hwang.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
Each action included calendar task tree refresh.
This version would be kept as it is, if problem would not occur.

To reviewers of Mozilla Thunderbird add-ons and users.

I request update this addon which is precious for me. 
About 620 times have been tried to execute these actions.
And, Thank you for approval and use of this addon. 

Thank you.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: Put task view vertically to read document in which records are many. Put task view neutrally to read tree lists. For height of neutrally horizontal view, it is changeable before any event. For changing sizes of vertical task view, they are not available, it is good not to resize task tree which was shrunk enough. Instead, See task view to close Today pane. Please, let me know whether default sizes of task tree, task view are needed to change them. praise Cardinal Soo-Hwan, Kim.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
README version 1.5

Title: TaskviewLayout

Required addons: Lightning.

Description:
Taskview layout.
Put task view up to read document of long sentences.
Put task view neutrally to read tree lists.
Put task view vertically to read document in which records are many.
For height of neutrally horizontal view, it is changeable before any event.
For changing sizes of vertical task view, they are not available,
it is good not to resize task tree which was shrunk enough.
Instead, See task view to close Today pane.
Please, let me know whether default sizes of task tree, task view are needed to change them.
praise Cardinal Soo-Hwan, Kim.

December 01 2019.

From Sungho Hwang.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
